abstract: The SodaStream home soda maker system, which bills itself as an alternative to bottled soft drinks, is joining the expensive ranks of advertisers during Super Bowl XLVII.
snippet: The SodaStream home soda maker system, which bills itself as an alternative to bottled soft drinks, is joining the expensive ranks of advertisers during Super Bowl XLVII.
lead_paragraph: 8:20 p.m. | Updated  An upstart marketer may bring some fizz to the annual advertising bowl that takes place inside the Super Bowl.

headline.main: Home Soda Maker to Join Coca-Cola and Pepsi as Super Bowl Advertiser
